DataElement.preferredName: Chemotherapy Agent Difficult To Take Every Day Person Not Always Near To Remind To Take Assessment Patient Assessment Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard of the patients assessment of chemotherapy agents being difficult to take on schedule every day because of a person not always near to remind me to take.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Chemotherapy Agent Difficult To Take Every Day Person Not Always Near To Remind To Take Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The use of synthetic or naturally-occurring chemicals for the treatment of diseases._An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect._A response indicating that something is or was difficult._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._As pertains to a medication: ingest, inhale, instill, or inject._Including all possibilities or occurring at regular intervals._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._A human being._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._At all times; on every occasion._Not far distant in time or space or degree or circumstances._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._A thing that causes someone to remember something._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._As pertains to a medication: ingest, inhale, instill, or inject._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.
